greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of permutations of [n] with exactly k (possibly overlapping) occurrences of the consecutive step patterns 010 or 101, where 1=up and 0=down; triangle T(n,k), n >= 0, k = max(0, n-3), read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..143, flattened
maple: b:= proc(u, o, t, h) option remember; expand(
T:= n-> (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=0..degree(p)))(b(n, 0$3)):
mathematica: T[n_] := Function[p, Table[Coefficient[p, x, i], {i, 0, Exponent[p, x]}]][ b[n, 0, 0, 0]];
Table[T[n], {n, 0, 12}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 07 2018, from Maple *)
xref: Last elements of rows for n>3 give: A001250, A260786, 2*A000111.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 01 2017
